description: This file defines classes and methods for managing AWS ACM certificates, including creating, reading, deleting, and storing certificate summaries. It is part of an infrastructure management library for AWS resources.

classes.name: CertificateSummary
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a summary of an ACM certificate, including its ARN and domain name.

classes.name: AcmCertificate
classes.description: A class representing an AWS ACM certificate resource, with methods to create, read, delete, and manage the certificate lifecycle.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Requests an ACM certificate using provided parameters and AWS API client.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for certificate validation and optionally stores a certificate summary to a file.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and retrieves the current certificate information from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the specified ACM certificate from AWS.

methods.name: get_certificate_arn
methods.description: Retrieves the ARN of the certificate from the stored certificate summary.
